wikipedia_page.main: Howard William Clark (born 19 September 1968) is an English former footballer who made 136 appearances in the Football League playing for Coventry City, Darlington, Shrewsbury Town and Hereford United. A midfielder or defender, Clark went on to play non-league football for Nuneaton Borough, Crawley Town and Hinckley Town.

response: *Howard Clark (bishop) (1903–1983), primate of the Anglican Church of Canada
*Howard Clark (golfer) (born 1954), European Tour and Ryder Cup golfer

*Howard Clarke (born 1929), Professor Emeritus of Classics at the University of California, Santa Barbara
